text: Manohar Kaul (1925–1999) was born in Srinagar, Kashmir. He was one of 20th century's most famous Kashmiri painters. His work is in the National Gallery of Modern Art in India. ==Writings== * Kashmir: Hindu, Buddhist and Muslim architecture, Sagar Publications (1971) * Trends in Indian painting, ancient, medieval, modern, Dhoomimal Ramchand (1961) ==External links== *Essay on Kaul by the art critic Keshav Malik - includes newspaper reviews Category:Indian male painters Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Kashmiri people Category:People from Srinagar Category:20th-century Indian painters Category:Painters from Jammu and Kashmir
title: Manohar Kaul
